function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear governance structure for urban green spaces","Impact":"Lack of clear responsibility and decision-making authority could lead to poor management and maintenance, increasing the risk of disease propagation.","Mitigation":"Establishing clear governance structures and decision-making processes, allocating sufficient resources for maintenance and management.","Technologies":"Urban planning and management software, public health monitoring systems.","People":"Residents, visitors, and workers in urban green spaces.","Owner":"Local governments, city planners, park management organizations."}]}
